PropertyChangeReader Class Reference

This base class is used to read in and apply a property change from a stream. More...

Detailed Description

This base class is used to read in and apply a property change from a stream.

int PropertyChangeReader::readAndApply ( BinaryIStream &  stream,
PropertyOwnerBase *  pOwner,
int  clientServerID,
PyObjectPtr *  ppOldValue = NULL,
PyObjectPtr *  ppChangePath = NULL 
)

This method reads and applies a property change.

Parameters:
stream The stream to read from.
pOwner The top-level owner of the property.
clientServerID The message id which could be the clientServerID.
ppOldValue If not NULL, this is set to the old value of the property.
Returns:
The top-level index of the change.
